CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yq         strace         chromium pulseaudio         python3         chromium-driver python3-selenium scala         curl unzip         rxvt-unicode-lite procps x11-apps vim         python3-requests openssh-client openjdk-8-jdk         sudo     &&     apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir /opt/selenium-java && cd /opt/selenium-java &&     curl https://selenium-release.storage.googleapis.com/3.1/selenium-java-3.1.0.zip -o /tmp/x.zip &&     unzip /tmp/x.zip && rm /tmp/x.zip &&     chmod 755 -Rc .
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get remove -yq scala-library scala &&     curl https://www.scala-lang.org/files/archive/scala-2.11.8.deb -o /tmp/s.deb &&     dpkg -i /tmp/s.deb && rm /tmp/s.deb
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: true || (apt-get update &&     apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yq wireshark tshark)
Commands.Name: run
